name: Little Seal Lucas
description:
SEAL THE DEAL!

Lucas is ready to go in his first ever game made exactly for the Game Boy system; Little Seal Lucas! Princess Penny's been attacked by Mortifer's backup crew and her lil' treasures has been taken along the process, and she calls help... but from Lucas himself!!! Jump and run through levels of simple platforming with a twist (in some way, somehow)! Get ready to seal the deal when Little Seal Lucas gets ready to be played on your Game Boy system!
